detail_desc: Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Nylon socks with elasticated tops.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a faux fur pompom on top and earflaps with ties. Fleece lining.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequined motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short dress in woven fabric with 3/4-length sleeves with an opening and ties at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Nightdress in soft, printed cotton jersey with short flutter sleeves.

Jacket in soft fleece made partly from recycled polyester designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Narrow elasticated trim at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Pyjama bottoms in cotton flannel with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and tapered legs.

Long-sleeved shirt in washed Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Imitation leather hi-tops with elasticated lacing at the front, an adjustable hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Cotton corduroy jacket with a pile collar and press-studs down the front and at the cuffs. Patch pockets with a flap and press-stud. Pile lining.
Non-wired push-up bralette in lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.
Joggers in washed stretch denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides.
Cold shoulder blouse in a viscose weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elastication and a flounce at the top, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a smocked hem.
Top in washed cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

prod_name: Timeless Push Up Tie back Bra
detail_desc: Bikini top with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back of the neck.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
Long jersey jumpsuit in a loose-fitting style with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck, seam at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Cardigan in a soft knit with long sleeves, slits in the sides and no buttons.
Straight-cut coat in imitation suede with no fasteners and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Patch front pockets and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Bralette in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, padded cups with removable inserts for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Dungarees in soft, stretch denim. Straps with adjustable press-stud fasteners at the top, and press-studs at the sides. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs in sizes 6-12M. Seam and belt loops at the waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and elasticated hems.
Sleeveless sports top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and twisted seams.

Boxy-style top in sturdy cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and a decorative V-neck seam at the front. Low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with decorative seams, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with narrow, adjustable straps, a wrapover front with ties at one side and a flounced hem. Unlined.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a foldover shaft. The socks are made partly from organic cotton.
Non-wired bras in soft cotton jersey with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved bolero in a fine, fluffy knit with a button at the neck.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck tops in organic cotton jersey.
Bikini briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a deep neckline at the back.

Shorter-style, double-breasted trenchcoat in woven fabric with a collar, shoulder tabs and a loose yoke at the back. Side pockets, a detachable belt at the waist, an adjustable tab and buckle at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Short T-shirt dress in soft jersey with short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Knee-length running shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Ventilating mesh at the crotch, and zipped side pockets. Jersey inner shorts.
Sleeveless, fitted, calf-length dress in jersey crêpe with draping at one side. V-neck, narrow shoulder straps, a sewn-in wrapover at the front, and an asymmetric hem with a slit in one side.
Soft, fine-knit jumper in a straight, relaxed fit with hard-worn details and long sleeves. Roll-edge neckline, slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Giraffe in soft faux fur with a detachable skirt and an accessory in the shape of a shimmering camera. Height approx. 26 cm.

Short, fitted dress in stretch jersey with a deep V-neck that is gathered at the bottom, and draping under the bust. Open back with crossover, twisted straps that create a gentle V-shaped neckline at the back. Lined.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck and adjustable halter neck. Cut-out sections at the sides and back and a fastening at the back.
Earrings in plastic and metal. Length 5.5 cm.
Reversible, padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a narrow elasticated edge, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
V-neck top in slub jersey with a lace yoke, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short shorts in soft jersey with a lace section at the sides and an elasticated, scallop-trimmed waist.
Short skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a high waist and wrapover front with ties at one side and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Calf-length jeans in washed stretch cotton denim with a high waist, small front pockets, back pockets and straight, wide legs with raw-edge, frayed hems.
Short, cold shoulder dress in jersey with a washed look. Short sleeves and an opening front and back with a fastener at the back of the neck. Unlined.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Satin blouse with a long, pointed collar and buttons down the front. Defined shoulders, extra-long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Lightly padded jacket in a quilted weave with a stand-up collar, hood and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and two mesh inner pockets. Elasticated edges around the hood, cuffs and hem. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Suede trainers with details at the heel in shimmering metallic leather. Lightly padded top edge, decorative elastication over the top, jersey linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short, fitted lace skirt with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back, and a scalloped hem. Lined.
Fitted polo-neck top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a silk and viscose blend with long sleeves. Overlocked edges at the neck, cuffs and hem.
Longer hooded top in soft fleece with appliqués and embroidery. Long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft and fluffy inside.
Metal necklace with a cherry-shaped pendant decorated with glass rhinestones, and a chain decorated with small, diamond-shaped pieces of flat metal. The zinc content of the necklace is recycled.
Short-sleeved sports top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.

Short, lightly padded jacket in woven fabric. Hood with a soft faux fur lining and a stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud. Zip and button band with concealed press-studs down the front, welt side pockets, ribbing at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Soft, non-wired, lace nursing bra with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Court shoes in soft imitation suede made partly from recycled polyester with pointed toes. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and high cut at the back.
Spiral twist metal earrings. Length 9 cm.
Jumper in fine-knit slub cotton with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved Henley top in soft jersey.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Set with a T-shirt in cotton jersey and shorts in a linen and cotton blend. T-shirt with a sailor collar and button placket. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Double-layered hat in printed jersey.
Padded gilet with a detachable hood and zip down the front. Lined.
Waistcoat in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets and diagonal front pockets. The cotton content of the waistcoat is partly recycled.
Rib-necked T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey coloured with natural dyes.
Jumper in a soft knit with a ribbed polo neck, cable-knit sections at the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Vest top in soft slub cotton jersey with a racer back.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Leather mules with leather insoles and rubber soles.
